backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining radio types, user profiles, signaling messages, and access‑controlled profile queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing promotion-related features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source file paths to brief summaries of their functionality and behavior.
frontend/docs/deployments/README.md: Index describing production deployment records, current version status, process overview, and access details.
frontend/docs/deployments/version-30-pro: Detailed record for Version 30 clean production deployment, including canister info, verification steps, and monitoring.
frontend/docs/deployments/version-55-pro: Record for Version 55 promotion deployment with canister details, verification results, and production access info.
frontend/docs/droidstar-settings-referen: Explains how the app replicates DroidStar behaviors including server list fetching, caching, UI population, and connection consistency without reverse‑engineering the APK.
frontend/docs/promotions/README.md: Provides an index of promotion records, current production version details, promotion workflow, principles, and verification checklist.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-23-prev: Contains the promotion record for Version 23 with required checklists and verification steps for a deployment‑only promotion.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-30-prev: Documents Version 30 promotion requirements, attestation, and detailed preview verification checklists for deployment‑only promotion.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-55-prev: Records Version 55 promotion with completed verification results, attestation, and status for all major application flows.
frontend/docs/publish-preview-to-product: Runbook describing the required steps and verification checklists for promoting a preview build to production without code changes.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes plus base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata and loading the React app root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and launch settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Static offline fallback page with minimal styling and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, offline handling, and network-first fetch strategy.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router and auth-driven navigation logic including post-login redirects.
frontend/src/auth/authClientStorage.ts: Namespaced localStorage adapter for regenerated Internet Identity auth and utilities to clear stored keys.
frontend/src/auth/iiAuthProvider.tsx: React provider managing Internet Identity authentication lifecycle, login flow, and identity state.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary component that displays fallback UI and supports session clearing and retry.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout wrapper providing header, navigation, footer, and mobile nav based on auth state and current route.
Displays a 20‑segment audio input meter that updates based on measured audio level and disabled state.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedFlo: Fallback UI showing error details and retry/clear-session options when authenticated flows fail.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Protects authenticated routes by handling login, error states, and actor initialization before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/AutoGatewayStatu: Shows whether gateway auto‑configuration is active and displays the inferred preset label.
frontend/src/components/ColorAccentPanel: Simple wrapper applying console‑style panel styling with optional variant and class overrides.
Renders a console‑style page header with title, subtitle, and optional icon for various page variants.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceConn: Large form for configuring Digital Voice connections, handling presets, validation, credentials, and auto‑loading saved settings.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceSave: Displays saved Digital Voice configuration with masking, missing‑field checks, and option to edit or view gateway status.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryBrowser: Provides a searchable, filterable network directory UI with mode tabs, favorites, and talkgroup selection handling.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchConne: Implements a form for configuring and saving IAX/DVSwitch connection settings, including advanced fields and preset loading.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchSaved: Displays saved IAX/DVSwitch connection details with masked sensitive fields and an optional edit action.
frontend/src/components/InstallAppAction: Shows a PWA install button and iOS-specific installation instructions when applicable.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Manages login/logout actions with error handling, retry logic, and session clearing.
frontend/src/components/NowHearingList.t: Renders a real-time list of recent transmissions with callsign, network, talkgroup, and metadata.
frontend/src/components/PersonalDirector: Manages local personal radio directory entries with add/delete UI and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/PostLoginInterst: Shows a loading screen during sign-in and displays a timeout error with retry options after 12 seconds.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new users to enter callsign and optional name, acknowledge license, and saves the profile.
frontend/src/components/PttControl.tsx: Implements a push‑to‑talk button handling press/release events and transmit state visuals.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeStatusBa: Displays a status badge reflecting connection, transmitting, or receiving states.
frontend/src/components/TransmitDisclaim: Warns users they must acknowledge a valid license before using voice features with link to settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Like useActor but adds detailed logging, retry logic, and exposes initialization errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLevelMeter.ts: Captures microphone audio and computes a live normalized audio level with cleanup handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile via a backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Implements hooks to fetch and toggle a user's favorite networks using react-query and actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines an Internet Identity context and provider handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicPttRecorder.ts: Manages microphone push-to-talk recording, producing an audio blob URL and handling permission errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworks.ts: Exposes hooks to fetch builtin networks and perform client-side search filtering via actor data.
frontend/src/hooks/useNowHearing.ts: Provides hooks to poll and update real-time transmission activity with backend synchronization.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferredConnectio: Handles saving, loading, validating, and clearing preferred connection configurations in session storage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Tracks PWA installability, iOS detection, installation state, and exposes a prompt to trigger install.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrzLookup.ts: Wraps a backend QRZ lookup call in a mutation with runtime method validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRememberLoginPrefe: Stores and retrieves a persistent 'remember login' preference using localStorage.
React Query hooks manage server directory sources and cached BrandMeister/AllStar server lists with failure‑tolerant fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller's role and admin status via an actor with retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRtcPtt.ts: Implements WebRTC push‑to‑talk state, signaling, media handling, and cleanup for joining and transmitting in voice rooms.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base theme with OKLCH console-style colors and utility classes for status lights and console components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutCompliancePage.t: Renders informational content about PTTStar, its creator, features, and licensing requirements.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Displays auto-updating recent transmission activity with manual refresh and a Now Hearing list.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Provides UI for configuring digital voice or IAX/DMR connections, handling presets, saved configs, and tab selection.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Renders the network directory page, allowing users to browse networks and talkgroups and initiate a PTT connection based on selections.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the app landing page with an introduction, requirements, and onboarding guidance for new users.
frontend/src/pages/PttPage.tsx: Implements the main PTT interface, managing connection state, WebRTC audio, room joining, and live activity display.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides user profile management, server directory configuration, and preference settings with validation and save actions.
frontend/src/utils/connectionPresets.ts: Defines preset connection types for digital voice and IAX networks and provides helper functions to query preset metadata.
frontend/src/utils/digitalVoiceGatewayCl: Implements a WebRTC signaling client for digital voice gateways, handling websocket signaling, metadata exchange, and SDP messaging.
frontend/src/utils/roomKey.ts: Generates stable room keys and human-readable labels based on connection settings using normalized addresses.
frontend/src/utils/serverAddress.ts: Normalizes server addresses for consistent comparison and provides an equality check wrapper.
Caches BrandMeister and AllStar directory lists in localStorage with timestamps and TTL warnings.
Fetches and parses BrandMeister and AllStar server lists with timeout handling and basic line parsing.
frontend/src/utils/serverDirectorySource: Manages storage and defaults for server list source URLs and related metadata in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Extracts URL parameters (including hash routing), persists them in sessionStorage, and provides cleanup utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state, listing existing features, new feature requests, known issues, and metadata for the promotion process of a preview build to production. Contains project configuration, status tracking, and documentation requirements.
